title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Java applications with generative AI (DVT210)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI现代化Java应用程序 (DVT210)
abstract: In this session, use Amazon Q Developer's transformation capabilities to modernize a Java application. Learn how Amazon Q Developer can leverage generative AI to automate common language upgrade tasks like updating your code, conducting unit tests, and verifying deployment readiness. Save days' or even months' worth of the undifferentiated work involved in moving from older language versions.
abstract_cn: 在本次会话中，使用Amazon Q Developer的转换功能来现代化Java应用程序。了解Amazon Q Developer如何利用生成式AI自动化常见的语言升级任务，如更新代码、执行单元测试和验证部署就绪性。节省从旧语言版本迁移所涉及的数天甚至数月的无差异化工作。
